posts.post_content:
For sale is a Hal Chase PSA 5 for $1,500 net to me.

Price includes shipping and assumes PayPal FF.  If using goods, add 3%.

First I'll take it supersedes all on-going negotiations.

Please email me at [url]frankbev29@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions.

I'll post a scan of the back later today (it's clean, no issues with it).
